meanings: (몸이) (상처 등이) painful, sore, (병으로) sick, ill, (동사로 쓰여) hurt, ache

meanings.meaning: pain and stiffness in her legs

vlive.korean: 응 - 아이언맨이 조금 아프고 이제 눈 감을 때... Yeah. - When the Iron Man is hurt and he closes his eyes... 듣기 View video NCT : D-5💚💚💚💚💚💚
vlive.english: Yeah. - When the Iron Man is hurt and he closes his eyes...

vlive.korean: 코 뚫을 때요? 잠깐 아프고 말아요 한 0.1초? When I pierced my nose? It stops hurting after a second. About 0.1 seconds? 듣기 View video VICTON : 쉬는시간😁
vlive.english: When I pierced my nose? It stops hurting after a second. About 0.1 seconds?

vlive.korean: "언니도 정말 아프고 힘든 성장통을 겪었고 지금도 겪고 있겠죠?" "You went through a painful and hard growing pain and you are right now, too, right?" 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 오랜만이에요!
vlive.english: "You went through a painful and hard growing pain and you are right now, too, right?"

vlive.korean: 진짜 팔만 아프고 진짜. My arm is hurting. 듣기 View video BTOB : 저녁 드셨나용🤗
귀가 아프고 무겁다고. His ears hurt and are heavy. 듣기 View video EMMA BEAUTY : [엠마뷰티 EMMA BEAUTY] 굿바이 겨울 메이크업 winter make-up
vlive.english: His ears hurt and are heavy.

examples.korean: pain and stiffness in her legs 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 다리가 아프고 결림 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: pain and stiffness in her legs Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was aching and feverish. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 몸이 아프고 열이 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was aching and feverish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She is still weak after her illness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아프고 난 후로 아직도 몸이 약하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is still weak after her illness. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’s up and about again after his illness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아프고 난 뒤에 다시 일어나 다닌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s up and about again after his illness. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’s very thin after her illness—but we’ll soon fatten her up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 녀석은 아프고 난 뒤 살이 많이 빠졌소. 하지만 우리가 곧 살을 찌울 거요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s very thin after her illness—but we’ll soon fatten her up. Add to Wordbook
